languages.text: "Всеаспектное изучение Простора Коронус является //священной миссией//оперативной задачей// флота Осознание. Данные о планетах и звездных системах Простора Коронус //должны быть//будут// скомпилированы, изучены и переданы в священные хранилища Марса по завершении //великого похода Эксплорации//миссии. Данная процедура увеличивает объем познания и умаляет объем незнания во вселенной".

"Omnifaceted study of the Koronus Expanse is the //sacred mission//operational objective// of the Cognisance Fleet. Information about the planets and star systems of the Koronus Expanse //must//will// be compiled, studied, and transferred to the holy repositories of Mars upon completion of the //great march of Exploration//mission//. This process increases the totality of knowledge and decreases the totality of ignorance in the universe."
languages.original_text: "Всеаспектное изучение Простора Коронус является //священной миссией//оперативной задачей// флота Осознание. Данные о планетах и звездных системах Простора Коронус //должны быть//будут// скомпилированы, изучены и переданы в священные хранилища Марса по завершении //великого похода Эксплорации//миссии. Данная процедура увеличивает объем познания и умаляет объем незнания во вселенной".

languages.text: 「コロヌス・エクスパンスを多面的に研究するのは、コグニサンス艦隊の//神聖なる任務//作戦目標//であります。コロヌス・エクスパンスの惑星や星系に関する情報は//絶対に//必ず//収集し、研究され、//大探索//任務//が完了次第、火星の神聖なる保管庫に移送されます。このプロセスは宇宙の知識の総体を増大させ、無知の総体を減少させます」
languages.original_text: "Omnifaceted study of the Koronus Expanse is the //sacred mission//operational objective// of the Cognisance Fleet. Information about the planets and star systems of the Koronus Expanse //must//will// be compiled, studied, and transferred to the holy repositories of Mars upon completion of the //great march of Exploration//mission//. This process increases the totality of knowledge and decreases the totality of ignorance in the universe."

traits.locale_text: 「コロヌス・エクスパンスを多面的に研究するのは、コグニサンス艦隊の//神聖なる任務//作戦目標//であります。コロヌス・エクスパンスの惑星や星系に関する情報は//絶対に//必ず//収集し、研究され、//大探索//任務//が完了次第、火星の神聖なる保管庫に移送されます。このプロセスは宇宙の知識の総体を増大させ、無知の総体を減少させます」

languages.text: “全面研究科罗努斯扩区，是真理开拓者舰队的神圣使命//行动目标//。关于科罗努斯扩区的行星和恒星系统的信息，//必须//将会//被汇编、研究，并在完成//伟大的探索之旅//任务//后，转移到火星的神圣宝库。这个过程会增加了宇宙中知识的总量，减少无知的总量。”
languages.original_text: "Omnifaceted study of the Koronus Expanse is the //sacred mission//operational objective// of the Cognisance Fleet. Information about the planets and star systems of the Koronus Expanse //must//will// be compiled, studied, and transferred to the holy repositories of Mars upon completion of the //great march of Exploration//mission//. This process increases the totality of knowledge and decreases the totality of ignorance in the universe."

traits.locale_text: “全面研究科罗努斯扩区，是真理开拓者舰队的神圣使命//行动目标//。关于科罗努斯扩区的行星和恒星系统的信息，//必须//将会//被汇编、研究，并在完成//伟大的探索之旅//任务//后，转移到火星的神圣宝库。这个过程会增加了宇宙中知识的总量，减少无知的总量。”

languages.text: «El estudio integral de la Extensión de Koronus es //la misión sagrada//el objetivo operacional// de la Flota Conciencia. La información sobre los planetas y sistemas estelares de la Extensión de Koronus //debe ser//será// recopilada, estudiada y transferida a los sagrados repositorios de Marte cuando se complete la //gran marcha de exploración//misión//. Este proceso pretende incrementar la cantidad del conocimiento y disminuir la cantidad de ignorancia en el universo».
languages.original_text: "Omnifaceted study of the Koronus Expanse is the //sacred mission//operational objective// of the Cognisance Fleet. Information about the planets and star systems of the Koronus Expanse //must//will// be compiled, studied, and transferred to the holy repositories of Mars upon completion of the //great march of Exploration//mission//. This process increases the totality of knowledge and decreases the totality of ignorance in the universe."

traits.locale_text: «El estudio integral de la Extensión de Koronus es //la misión sagrada//el objetivo operacional// de la Flota Conciencia. La información sobre los planetas y sistemas estelares de la Extensión de Koronus //debe ser//será// recopilada, estudiada y transferida a los sagrados repositorios de Marte cuando se complete la //gran marcha de exploración//misión//. Este proceso pretende incrementar la cantidad del conocimiento y disminuir la cantidad de ignorancia en el universo».

languages.text: « L'étude multidimensionnelle des Étendues de Koronus est le //devoir sacré//dessein opérationnel// de la Flotte de la Connaissance. Les informations relatives aux planètes et aux systèmes stellaires des Étendues de Koronus //doivent être//seront// compilées, analysées et transférées aux archives sacrées de Mars une fois la //grande marche de l'Exploration//mission// terminée. Ce processus augmente la totalité du savoir et réduit celle de l'ignorance dans l'univers. »
languages.original_text: "Omnifaceted study of the Koronus Expanse is the //sacred mission//operational objective// of the Cognisance Fleet. Information about the planets and star systems of the Koronus Expanse //must//will// be compiled, studied, and transferred to the holy repositories of Mars upon completion of the //great march of Exploration//mission//. This process increases the totality of knowledge and decreases the totality of ignorance in the universe."

traits.locale_text: « L'étude multidimensionnelle des Étendues de Koronus est le //devoir sacré//dessein opérationnel// de Fa flotte de la Connaissance. Les informations relatives aux planètes et aux systèmes stellaires des Étendues de Koronus //doivent être//seront// compilées, analysées et transférées aux archives sacrées de Mars une fois la //grande marche de l'Exploration//mission// terminée. Ce processus augmente la totalité du savoir et réduit celle de l'ignorance dans l'univers. »

languages.text: "Das umfassende Studium der Koronus-Ausdehnung ist //die heilige Mission//das Einsatzziel// der Erkenntnisflotte. Informationen über die Planeten und Sonnensysteme //müssen//sollen// zusammengetragen, studiert und nach Abschluss //des großen Explorationsmarschs//der Mission// in die heiligen Archive auf dem Mars überführt werden. Dieses Vorgehen vergrößert die Gesamtheit des Wissens und verringert die Gesamtheit der Unwissenheit im Universum."
languages.original_text: "Omnifaceted study of the Koronus Expanse is the //sacred mission//operational objective// of the Cognisance Fleet. Information about the planets and star systems of the Koronus Expanse //must//will// be compiled, studied, and transferred to the holy repositories of Mars upon completion of the //great march of Exploration//mission//. This process increases the totality of knowledge and decreases the totality of ignorance in the universe."

traits.locale_text: "Das umfassende Studium der Koronus-Ausdehnung ist //die heilige Mission//das Einsatzziel// der Erkenntnisflotte. Informationen über die Planeten und Sonnensysteme //müssen//sollen// zusammengetragen, studiert und nach Abschluss //des großen Explorationsmarschs//der Mission// in die heiligen Archive auf dem Mars überführt werden. Dieses Vorgehen vergrößert die Gesamtheit des Wissens und verringert die Gesamtheit der Unwissenheit im Universum."

languages.text: "Koronus Enginliği'nin kapsamlı biçimde araştırılması, Malumat Filosu'nun //kutsal görevidir//operasyonel hedefidir//. Koronus Enginliği'nin gezegen ve yıldız sistemleri hakkındaki bilgiler, //büyük Keşif seferinin//görevin// tamamlanmasının ardından derlenip incelenip Mars'ın kutsal veri bankalarına aktarılacaktır//aktarılması gerekmektedir. Bu süreç, evrende bilginin varlığını artırırken cahilliğin varlığını ise azaltacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Omnifaceted study of the Koronus Expanse is the //sacred mission//operational objective// of the Cognisance Fleet. Information about the planets and star systems of the Koronus Expanse //must//will// be compiled, studied, and transferred to the holy repositories of Mars upon completion of the //great march of Exploration//mission//. This process increases the totality of knowledge and decreases the totality of ignorance in the universe."

traits.locale_text: "Koronus Enginliği'nin kapsamlı bir şekilde araştırılması, Malumat Filosu'nun //kutsal görevidir//operasyonel hedefidir//. Koronus Enginliği'nin gezegen ve yıldız sistemleri hakkındaki bilgiler, //büyük Keşif seferinin//görevinin// tamamlanmasının ardından Mars'ın kutsal veri bankalarına aktarılmalı ve orada //derlenmeli//üzerine çalışılmalıdır//. Bu süreç, evrende bilginin varlığını artıracak ve cahilliğin varlığını azaltacaktır."
